title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamIEEE1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IEEE steam turbine governor model.  Ref

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamIEEE1

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor gain (reciprocal of droop) (K) (> 0).  Typical Value = 25. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after first boiler pass (K1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after first boiler pass (K2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after second boiler pass (K3).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

k4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after second boiler pass (K4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after third boiler pass (K5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

k6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after third boiler pass (K6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of HP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

k8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of LP shaft power after fourth boiler pass (K8).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0) Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening (Pmax) (> Pmin).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum valve opening (Pmin) (>= 0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lag time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lead time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Valve positioner time constant (T3) (> 0).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inlet piping/steam bowl time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of second boiler pass (T5).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of third boiler pass (T6).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of fourth boiler pass (T7).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

uc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve closing velocity (Uc) (< 0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -10. Default: 0.0

uo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening velocity (Uo) (> 0).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0
